content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> "The last dandelion" what do you think about that caption?

Using the style of encouraging deeper reflection on the caption, such as “What elements of the droodle does this title relate to?” can help the user delve into their thought process and refine their choice more meaningfully. This approach supports metacognitive skills and promotes a stronger connection between the image and the title to enhance creativity.
